CustomField.description: Assignment start and end date restriction while loading the Assignments in the Timecard UI. If true, only Assignments whose start/end dates either contain or overlap with the Timecard date range are loaded. This affects the UI only, not Admin edit or manual/native Timecard creation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Assignment start and end date restriction while loading the Assignments in the Timecard UI. If true, only Assignments whose start/end dates either contain or overlap with the Timecard date range are loaded. This affects the UI only, not Admin edit.
CustomField.label: Assignments load date restriction
